Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Common Area 75,000 sq. ft. of outdoor spaces
% d''espace commun Cour centrale verte de 75 000 pi²

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Corner of Le Corbusier Blvd and Jacques-Tétreault Street

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The only major development directly connected to Metro Montmorency. Site open to public in Summer 2022. Touchless technologies to access the parking, elevators, building and office premises. Larger corridors allowing for social distancing. Flexible office configurations ideal for hybrid work from office/work from home scenarios. 1,500 interior parking spaces – avoid parking hassles, especially in the winter. Smart building technology for ordering food, reserving parking, booking entertainment via a Smart Building App. Fitness center access for all tenants. Hotel on site which is perfect for employees and collaborators from out of town. Across the street from Place Bell which is a key entertainment venue in Laval. Features a 75,000 sq. ft. central outdoor courtyard for sports and cultural activities, skating rink and heated sidewalks in winter. Unique variety of restaurant options. Targeting LEED Gold certification to lessen the environmental footprint.
